CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Verified_Income_Frequency__c ,"Weekly"), Verified_Income_Amount__c *52/12, IF(ISPICKVAL(Verified_Income_Frequency__c ,"Fortnightly"), Verified_Income_Amount__c *26/12, IF(ISPICKVAL(Verified_Income_Frequency__c ,"Monthly"), Verified_Income_Amount__c , IF(ISPICKVAL(Verified_Income_Frequency__c ,"Annually"), Verified_Income_Amount__c /12, Verified_Income_Amount__c ))))
CustomField.label: Annual Verified Income
